properties.name: jwt.secret
properties.description: Secret key for JWT token signing

properties.name: jwt.expiration
properties.description: JWT token expiration time in milliseconds

properties.name: jwt.refresh.expiration
properties.description: JWT refresh token expiration time in milliseconds

properties.name: gemini.api.key
properties.description: API key for Google Gemini AI service

properties.name: frankfurter.base.url
properties.description: Base URL for Frankfurter currency exchange API
